visaProcess.title: Steps to Obtain a Student Visa
visaProcess.desc: To study at Iranian universities, international students must obtain a student visa. This visa grants them legal entry and residency in Iran for academic purposes. The application process involves multiple steps, requiring specific documents and administrative follow-ups.

step1.title: Secure Admission from a University
step1.description: Before applying for a visa, applicants must receive an official admission letter from a recognized Iranian university. This document confirms their eligibility for the chosen program.

step2.title: Prepare and Submit Required Documents
step2.point1: A valid passport with at least six months of validity
step2.point2: Official admission letter from the university

step3.title: Submit Visa Application
step3.description: Once all documents are prepared, the visa application must be submitted through the relevant authorities. This step includes document submission and payment of processing fees.

step4.title: Visa Processing and Issuance
step4.point1: After submission, the application undergoes a review by the relevant authorities.
step4.point2: If approved, the student visa will be issued. Processing times may vary depending on the applicant’s case and submission timing.

whyUs.point2-desc: Hassle-free document submission and visa application process.
whyUs.point4-desc: Minimized waiting time and reduced delays.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does it take to process a student visa?
faq.a1: Processing times vary depending on the applicant’s case, university approval, and submission timing. On average, it may take a few weeks.
faq.q2: Can I work while studying in Iran?
faq.a2: Student visas are primarily for academic purposes, and work permits may be required for employment. It is advisable to check with the university and local authorities.
faq.q3: What happens if my visa application is rejected?
faq.a3: If your application is rejected, we can assist in identifying the reasons and guide you through reapplying or providing alternative solutions.
faq.q4: Do I need a medical check-up for the student visa?
faq.a4: Yes, a medical health certificate is one of the required documents for the application process.
